name: No Candies Please
description:
This game was made for Beginner's Circle Jam #2 , whose theme was CANDY.

Game description :

Oh no , the Really Sweet Corp. has announced a new kind of candy that is claimed to kill all the germs present in the mouth. That's very dangerous for you and your whole germ community. Responsibility is on your shoulders because you are the most evolved dental germ til now. Take down all the workers and the boss before it takes down you.
